title: On the Burde--de Rham theorem for finitely presented pro-$p$ groups
authors: Yasushi Mizusawa, Ryoto Tange, and Yuji Terashima
abstract:
We consider the Burde--de Rham theorem for finitely presented pro-$p$ groups
under the assumption that the total degrees of all relators are $0$. We also
give some concrete examples including higher-dimensional cases under Iwasawa
theoretic conditions, and consider some cohomological interpretations.
